footer.v: Gõ 2 kí tự đầu, Ấn mũi tên xuống trên bàn phím để tăng mã tự động

items.key: status = '1' and ma_dvcs in (select ma_dvcs from vdmdvcs)

footer.v: Gõ MST, ấn Enter Sivip tự tìm tên và địa chỉ

header.v: Diễn giải hóa đơn ngầm định

footer.v: 1 - Còn sử dụng, 0 - Không còn sử dụng

command.text: declare @unitName nvarchar(1023), @emailmd char(128) select @unitName = case when @@language = 'v' then ten_dvcs else ten_dvcs2 end from dmdvcs where ma_dvcs = @@unit IF (select cusemailfruser from dmdvcskb where ma_dvcs = @@unit) = '1' set @emailmd = (select e_mail from vsysuserinfo where id = @@userID) else set @emailmd = '' select 'this._url$EInvoice=''~/AppService/sivip.asmx'';this._service$Method=''getttmst'';this._emailmd=''' + rtrim(@emailmd) + ''';this._unitCode=''' + @@unit + ''';this._unitName=''' + replace(replace(isnull(@unitName, ''), '\', '\\'), '''', '\''') + ''';initUnitSite(this);active$FormCustomer(this);' as message return

declare @$exists nvarchar(512), @$updateConflict nvarchar(512), @$recordHasBeenChanged nvarchar(512), @$deleteConflict nvarchar(512), @$taxCodeConflict nvarchar(512), @$scriptConflict nvarchar(512), @$typeConflict nvarchar(512) select @$exists = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Khách hàng %s đã có hoặc lồng nhau trong danh mục.' else N'The customer %s is invalid or already exists.' end select @$updateConflict = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Khách hàng %s đã phát sinh, không thể sửa được.' else N'Cannot edit the customer %s. It has already been used.' end select @$deleteConflict = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Khách hàng %s đã phát sinh, không thể xóa được.' else N'Cannot delete the customer %s. It has already been used.' end select @$recordHasBeenChanged = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Khách hàng %s đã được sửa hoặc xóa bởi người sử dụng khác.' else N'The customer %s has been modified or deleted by another user.' end select @$taxCodeConflict = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Mã số thuế %s đã có trong danh mục.' else N'The tax code %s is already exists.' end, @$scriptConflict = '', @$typeConflict = null

if exists(select top 1 ma_kh, ma_dvcs from @@table where (((rtrim(ltrim(ma_kh)) like rtrim(@ma_kh) + '%') and (rtrim(ltrim(ma_dvcs)) = ltrim(rtrim(@ma_dvcs)) )) or ((ltrim(rtrim(@ma_kh)) like ltrim(rtrim(ma_kh)) + '%') and ltrim(rtrim(@ma_dvcs)) = ltrim(rtrim(ma_dvcs))))) begin select 'ma_kh' as field, replace(@$exists, '%s', rtrim(@ma_kh)) as message return end &SVICheckEmail;&CheckTaxCodeBeginTag;&CheckTaxCodeEndTag; select @datetime0 = getdate(), @datetime2 = getdate(), @user_id0 = @@userID, @user_id2 = @@userID

declare @message nvarchar(255) select @message = replace(@$deleteConflict, '%s', rtrim(@ma_kh)) if exists(select top 1 ma_kh, ma_dvcs from cdkh where ma_kh = @ma_kh and ma_dvcs = @@unit) begin select @message as message return end if exists(select top 1 ma_kh, ma_dvcs from ct00 where ma_kh = @ma_kh and ma_dvcs = @@unit) begin select @message as message return end

dir.response:
&XMLSuggestion;
declare @ttkh_option CHAR(1), @tenkh nvarchar(max), @dckh nvarchar(max), @matt char(3), @tentt nvarchar(1024) SELECT @ttkh_option = tt_kh from dmdvcskb where ma_dvcs= @@unit set @tenkh = '' set @dckh = '' IF @ttkh_option = '0' BEGIN set @tenkh = '' set @dckh = '' End IF @ttkh_option = '1' and @ma_so_thue <> '' BEGIN set @tenkh = dbo.tenkh(@ma_so_thue) set @dckh = dbo.diachikh(@ma_so_thue) set @matt = '' set @tentt = '' End IF @ttkh_option = '2' and @ma_so_thue <> '' BEGIN set @tenkh = (select ten_kh from svttmst where ma_so_thue = @ma_so_thue) set @dckh = (select dia_chi from svttmst where ma_so_thue = @ma_so_thue) set @matt = (select ma_tt from svttmst where ma_so_thue = @ma_so_thue) set @tentt = (select ten_tt from svttmst where ma_so_thue = @ma_so_thue) End select rtrim(@tenkh) as tenkh, rtrim(@dckh) as diachi, rtrim(@matt) as matt, rtrim(@tentt) as tentt
